UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Site Mutation Improves the Expression and Antimicrobial Properties of Fungal Defense
Literature.Author: Hao Y, Teng D, Mao R, Yang N, Wang J

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=16µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=>32µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus E48(MIC=>16µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus CVCC 546(MIC=>16µg/ml)
